abstract: A notification that a pasteboard object posts when its contents change.
overview:
## Discussion

This happens at the same time the pasteboard’s change count ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/changeCount] property) is incremented. Changes include the addition, removal, and modification of pasteboard items. The `userInfo` dictionary may contain the representation types of pasteboard items that have been added to or removed from the pasteboard. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/userinfo-dictionary-keys] for the keys used to access these representation types. If pasteboard items have been modified but not added or removed, the `userInfo` dictionary is `nil`.

# changedNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that a pasteboard object posts when its contents change.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated class let changedNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

This happens at the same time the pasteboard’s change count ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/changeCount] property) is incremented. Changes include the addition, removal, and modification of pasteboard items. The `userInfo` dictionary may contain the representation types of pasteboard items that have been added to or removed from the pasteboard. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/userinfo-dictionary-keys] for the keys used to access these representation types. If pasteboard items have been modified but not added or removed, the `userInfo` dictionary is `nil`.

## Notifications

- **removedNotification**: A notification that a pasteboard object posts just before an app removes it.
